div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1598 Sur (anc. Tyre) environs, Phoenicia, c. 1966 Burial: c. 126-125 B.C. Contents: 14 AR Alexander I Bala: 1 tetradr. (Tyre) Antiochus VII: 2 tetradr. (Tyre) Demetrius II: 6 tetradr.; 5 didr. (Tyre, latest date 187 S.E.) Disposition: dispersed Fischer, SM 1968, pp. 51-2
